reviews.text: Outstanding! They share space with Mutation Brewing, so can easily grab a brew to enjoy with your sammich.  Really good chicken ‚Äî so much better than any fast food place I won‚Äôt name.  Flavorful, juicy, crispy, yum.  The ‚Äúchill‚Äù version is moderately hot.  Great fries, too, and a great value for what you get.
The fried chicken sandwich is fantastic. The breading, the size of the filet, and the spice was perfect. I also really enjoyed my tater tots. Incredible food inside Mutation Brewery.

The food is AMAZING! We have tried the dirty fries, chicken sandwich, mac and cheese, brussel sprouts, the cruffle‚Ä¶..EVERYTHING is great and we will honestly drive an hour just to come get food here. It‚Äôs just that good! If Google let you give 10/10 stars we would. ‚ó°Ãà

I just had the pleasure of checking out Scoville Hot Chicken on their opening day in Mutation Brewing Company, and WOW ‚Äì they absolutely crushed it! From the moment I walked in, the energy was fantastic, and you could tell the team was excited to finally share their delicious chicken with the world.

The menu is full of mouth-watering options, and I went for their signature hot chicken. It did not disappoint! The chicken was crispy, perfectly seasoned, and had just the right level of heat. If you're a fan of spice, this place is a MUST. I also tried their sides ‚Äì the mac and cheese was creamy, and the fries were crispy and flavorful.

The Scoville and Mutation Brewing staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure everything was just right, even on Scoville's first day. I was impressed by how smooth everything ran, especially with all the excitement surrounding their grand opening!

Overall, Scoville Hot Chicken is off to a phenomenal start, and I can't wait to return. I‚Äôll definitely be recommending this place to everyone I know. Congrats on the successful launch ‚Äì you‚Äôve earned a loyal customer!

I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect from a hot chicken spot inside a brewery, but Scoville absolutely delivered. The chicken was perfectly crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. The spice level was just right‚Äîhot enough to feel it, but still full of flavor. You can tell the chicken is marinated well, not just tossed in seasoning.

Ordering was fast and easy with the kiosk, and the food came out quickly. I grabbed a beer from Mutation Brewing to go with the sandwich and it was a great combo. This place is a hidden gem‚Äîdefinitely worth a visit if you're in Sandy Springs.

detailedReviews.text: It's inside a bar and hang out spot. Dogs are allowed in this place, so keep that in mind.  The lack of a person at the register makes it feel like you are buying out of a snack machine. The prople working in the back getting orders ready were really nice though.

detailedReviews.author: Sumaira Tahir
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely loved our meal here! We ordered the jumbo tender meal with a chicken sandwhich and they were both phenomenal! The chicken was super juicy and flavorful and had the perfect crunch you look for in a fried chicken! Can't wait to try the hottest of the hot chicken next time to go with our chilled strawberry lemonade!

detailedReviews.text:
Ive been fortunate to meet the owner on multiple occasions. Hes a very experienced and passionate restaurateur. Has a team of very hard working people who make a fantastic product.

detailedReviews.author: Vipin Shri
detailedReviews.text: Awesome spot within an equally awesome brewery! The extra hot was the right amount of heat for the chicken tender sandwich and the ‚ÄúHotlanta‚Äù flavor for wings is genius‚Ä¶lemon pepper AND buffalo? So good!

detailedReviews.author: Sara Yassine
detailedReviews.text:
If I could give this place six stars, I would. The fried chicken here is next-level ‚Äî perfectly golden, ridiculously crispy on the outside, and unbelievably juicy inside. You can tell it‚Äôs cooked fresh because every bite is piping hot and full of flavor. The seasoning is spot-on: savory with just the right kick of spice, the kind that makes you want to slow down so it lasts longer‚Ä¶ but also inhale it because it‚Äôs that good.
The staff is friendly, quick, and clearly proud of what they serve, and the atmosphere has that warm, welcoming vibe that makes you want to come back before you‚Äôve even left.

detailedReviews.author: Rahyan Yassine
detailedReviews.text:
If you love heat and flavor, Scovile‚Äôs Hot Chicken is an absolute must. From the moment you walk in, the smell of crispy, perfectly seasoned chicken hits you like a warm hug‚Ä¶ from a pepper. The chicken is juicy inside, with that golden, crunchy coating that sings with every bite. The spice levels are spot-on ‚Äî from mild for the cautious to ‚ÄúI‚Äôve made a life decision‚Äù for the brave.

The sides deserve just as much love: creamy mac & cheese, tangy coleslaw, and fries that stay crisp even after a dip in their addictive house sauces. The staff is friendly, quick, and genuinely passionate about what they serve. You can tell they‚Äôve perfected their craft.

Scovile‚Äôs isn‚Äôt just a meal ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience. Whether you‚Äôre here for a casual lunch or testing your spice tolerance with friends, you‚Äôll leave full, happy, and maybe wiping a tear or two (the good kind).

üî• Pro tip: Don‚Äôt skip the extra sauce, and definitely grab a sweet tea to balance the burn.

Great fries, too, and a great value for what you get.
